sentence.Network_en: The book does not purport to be a complete history of the period.
sentence.Network_cn: 本书无意标榜为那个时期的全史。

sentence.Network_en: Many theories purport to explain growth in terms of a single cause.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多理论都标榜以单一的原因解释生长.

sentence.Network_en: What's the purport of her letter?

list.abs: Because , for all their purported benefits , probiotics are not medicine ., 对所有他们谣传的益处 , 因为益生菌不是药品.

based on this , the research purports and methods of supersaturated vapor nucleation and condensation on the surface of PM2.5 from combustion are presented .在对蒸汽在细微颗粒物上的异质核化理论发展进行评述的基础上，提出过饱和水蒸汽在燃烧源PM2.5上核化凝结理论和实验研究的意义与方法。

可配伍性 compatibility标明 purporting to应成文并遵循 shall be in writing and shall be followed.

derivation.yuyuan_name: English (in the sense 'express, signify'): from Old French purporter, from medieval Latin proportare, from Latin pro- 'forth' + portare 'carry, bear'. The sense 'appear to be' dates from the late 18th cent

entry.def: If you say that someone or something purports to do or be a particular thing, you mean that they claim to do or be that thing, although you may not always believe that claim.

example.ex: ...a book that purports to tell the whole truth.
example.tran: 声称要讲述全部事实的一本书

means.word_mean: 1. the intended meaning of a communication
1. have the often specious appearance of being, intending, or claiming;

sentences.sentence: "The letter purports to express people's opinion"

auth_sentence.content: His paintings purport to show the domestic scenes...of the ancients.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

means.word_mean: 声称是…;(装得)像是…的样子

sentences.en: Documents leaked to this newspaper purport to reveal that radioactive waste is being illegally dumped on the site.
sentences.cn: 透露给报纸的文件声称是揭露放射性废料正被非法倾倒到此地一事。

sentences.en: Many theories purport to explain growth in terms of a single cause.
sentences.cn: 许多理论都标榜以单一的原因解释生长。

sentences.en: She purports to represent the whole group.
The film purported to represent the lives of ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 这部影片声称旨在表现普通人的生活。

means.word_mean: (某一言论或行动的)意义,要旨
